DescriptionData.Title: Adult Striped Knee Socks
DescriptionData.Description: Classic knee high striped clown socks are also ideal for use as soccer socks, rugby socks or almost any other sport socks! These black and hot pink striped socks have stripes reaching from cuff to toe, featuring a cushioned foot. Socks are made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13, approximately 27"). Shoe sizes 5 and up.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Cushioned foot
Stripes from cuff to toe with cushioned foot
Designed for clowns, but also ideal for sports
Sized to fit most adults (sock size 11-13, shoe size 5 and up). Socks are 27 inches.
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic

Socks are made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic and sized to fit most adults (socks sizes 11 - 13, approximately 27"). Shoe sizes 5 and up.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Cushioned foot
Stripes from cuff to toe with cushioned foot
Designed for clowns, but also ideal for sports
Sized to fit most adults (sock size 11-13, shoe size 5 and up). Socks are 27 inches.
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic
